name: Galactineers
description: Galactineers is a genre-mix of open world sandbox game and realtime strategy game. You can use blocks and items to build your world in space, and also construct your own ships. Win cooperative PVE missions or PVP arena battles with your own custom ships.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Dual Core 2.2 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 450 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Quad Core 3 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 450 MB available space
